definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
(bird species of China) Vaurie's nightjar (Caprimulgus centralasicus)
(bird species of China) yellow-eyed pigeon (Columba eversmanni)

sentences.english: The two-humped camel of central Asia was also domesticated long ago.
sentences.chinese: 中亚的双峰骆驼，很早以前就被驯化。

sentences.english: A big earthquake occurred in the Republic of Kyrgystan in the Central Asian region.
sentences.chinese: 中亚地区的吉尔吉斯斯坦发生大地震。

sentences.english: Select Jinxing Central Asia, to protect you, the user first choice.
sentences.chinese: 选择金兴中亚，为您保驾护航，用户第一首选。

sentences.english: Uzbeks are among the most orthodox of the Central Asian peoples.
sentences.chinese: 乌兹别克人是中亚最传统的民族。

sentences.english: This makes the som the second highest-valued currency unit in Central Asia.
sentences.chinese: 索姆在中亚地区是价值第二高的流通货币。

sentences.english: The middle formation of s_3 member in Wendong area has features of deposition from gravity flow.
sentences.chinese: 文东地区沙三中亚段具有重力流沉积特征。

sentences.english: A city of southwest Central Asian U. S. S. R. on the Amu Darya southwest of Tashkent.
sentences.chinese: 苏联中亚部分西南一城市，位于塔什干西南阿穆达亚。

sentences.english: Kyrgyzstan is a landlocked, mountainous country in Central Asia.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔吉斯斯坦是位于中亚的内陆国，境内多山。

sentences.english: The mix of faces told of Central Asia's tumultuous history of conquest and reconquest.
sentences.chinese: 各种各样的脸可以说明中亚一次次被征服的历史。

sentences.english: After the crash of Soviet Union, great changes have taken place in the geo-politics of Central Asia.
sentences.chinese: 苏联解体后，中亚的地缘政治格局发生很大变化。

sentences.english: The elusive Central Asian snow leopard steps into the risk-filled future.
sentences.chinese: 中亚雪豹正逐步步入充满风险的未来。

sentences.english: The deep south of Central Asia has a feel all its own.
sentences.chinese: 中亚的南方深处彷佛遗世独立一般。

sentences.english: On the return journey they carry weapons and gemstones from central Asia.
sentences.chinese: 归来时他们带着来自中亚的武器和宝石。

sentences.english: Shen briefed the press delegation on the development of the relations between China and Central Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 沈国放向新闻团介绍了中国与中亚国家关系发展情况。

sentences.english: A method for the determination of ferrous in chromite ores was developed.
sentences.chinese: 对铬铁矿中亚铁的测定方法进行了探讨。

sentences.english: He left for Central Asia and joined the resistance after deserting his family.
sentences.chinese: 离弃了家人后，他前往中亚并加入了抵抗组织。

definition: the Ferghana Valley in modern Uzbekistan
pinyin: Fei4 er3 gan4 na4 Pen2 di4

definition: Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
Turkmenistan/Republic of Turkmenistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Iran

Amu Darya, the biggest river of Central Asia, from Pamir to Aral sea, forming the boundary between Afghanistan and Tajikistan then flowing through Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan/formerly called Oxus by Greek and Western writers, and Gihon by medieval Islamic writers
Bokhara or Bukhara city in Uzbekistan
